near0003: I wonder if he'll find it...
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Isn't this orb great?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>After the sand shroud went away, I came
outside and found it lying right here!
talk0027:
<clr:0200><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Aha! "Voe will make up reasons to talk with you."
Just like Ms. Ashai said!<sp:0:2:2:6400><clr:ffff>
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Heehee. I found the perfect hiding spot!<sp:0:4:0>Good luck figuring out where I put the
stuffed sand-seal doll!<sp:0:4:0>Are you ready to go? Then start!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That game was so much fun!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>It reminds me of something Ms. Ashai
told me.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>If there's a voe I have fun hanging out
with, then he's a very special voe indeed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>See! I knew right from the start that you
were a special voe.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Let's play together again sometime!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I picked out a prize and everything, so
good luck! If you're ready, then...start!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:CallFar_00>GAAAME OVERRR! <sp:5:0:0>Meet me back at the
entrance to the shelter!
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Ooo, you were so close! <sp:5:0:0>I was on pins and
needles watching you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>What do you want to do now? Do you feel
like challenging me again?
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You found it again? That's amazing!<sp:5:0:0>
This means you get the reward I picked
out for you.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>I had a lot of fun this time too. <sp:5:1:0>Let's play
together again sometime!
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Wow! You found it!<sp:0:4:0>I have a reward picked out for you, so
meet me back at the shelter entrance!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>That's too bad.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>But it's all right! I'll accept your challenge
anytime! Come and find me when I'm
helping with the shop, OK?
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Ooo, you were so close! <sp:5:0:0>I was on pins and
needles watching you.<sp:0:4:0>But I won't let you borrow my orb until
you challenge me and win.<sp:0:4:0>So do you want to try again?
talk0040:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>That's too bad.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>But I had a lot of fun! <sp:5:0:0>Let's play together
again sometime!
talk0000: <sp:3:0:2:0801>Ah! It's the special voe! <sp:5:0:0>Hey, look at this!
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Where should I hide it? <sp:5:1:0>Here? <sp:5:1:0>Actually,
over here might be better...<sp:0:4:0><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oops, my feet got all wet! <sp:5:1:0>Oh well.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>OK, you can open your eyes now!<sp:5:0:0>
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>I've been waiting for you, voe! Are you
ready to play— I mean, ready for a
challenge?<sp:0:4:0>Mama thinks it's weird, but I know my orb
is real cute! <sp:5:0:0>That's why you want it, right?<sp:0:4:0>I'm all set right now if you're ready for the
challenge to start.
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Heeere we are!<sp:0:4:0>If you find the <clr:0000>stuffed sand-seal doll<clr:ffff>
before time runs out, you win!<sp:0:4:0>Close your eyes for a minute while I go
hide it, OK?
talk0042:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Where should I hide it? <sp:5:1:0>I've got to pick
a spot fast...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Yikes! That was close.<sp:0:4:0>This is the way out of the shelter into
some caves, and Mama says I'm not
allowed there.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>OK, you can open your eyes now!
talk0002: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Work_00>I'm ready! Come on, let's start the game!
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Where should I hide it? <sp:5:1:0>Here? <sp:5:0:0>Actually,
over here might be better...<sp:0:4:0><snd:Notice_00>Ooo! This is perfect! <sp:5:0:0>He'll never think to
look by the bed.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>OK, you can open your eyes now!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's what I like to hear!<sp:0:4:0>But we can't face off here. Let's go to
the shelter!
talk0044:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Where should I hide it? <sp:5:1:0>I've got to pick
a spot fast...<sp:0:4:0><snd:Notice_01>Did this stuff belong to the soldiers?<sp:5:0:0>
Gotta brace myself...<sp:5:0:0>and...<sp:5:0:0>push!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>OK! You can open your eyes now!
talk0005:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200><sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Aha! <sp:5:0:0>I learned about this in "Voe and You"! <sp:5:1:0>"It's
common for a voe to decline at first."<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_01>I got so scared for a second! <sp:5:0:0>Don't play
with fire, OK? Promise?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Congrats though! <sp:5:0:0>You win!<sp:0:4:0>We can meet back up at the entrance to
the shelter.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Heeere we are!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Everybody's gone back to the surface,
so I get to use the shelter as my own
playground!<sp:0:4:0>Here's the game. <sp:5:0:0>I'm gonna hide a <clr:0000>stuffed
sand-seal doll <clr:ffff>somewhere here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_01>If you find it before time runs out,
you win!<sp:0:4:0>OK, now close your eyes for a minute
while I hide it.
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>I'll share some of my allowance with you.<sp:5:1:0>
We should play again sometime!
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>That weird-looking orb is very
important to <clr:0000>Dalia<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I know that the chief said that you're free
to use anything in town.<sp:0:4:0>But you shouldn't touch that thing until
you've checked with Dalia first.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Humming>I'm confident I picked a good hiding spot
this time!
talk0031:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Come on!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400>Didn't I tell you how important that weird-
looking orb is to <clr:0000>Dalia<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>If you take it away without Dalia's say-so,
it'll be me who's left with an upset vehvi
to soothe.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Happy_01>Oh, you found it!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Good job! You win!<sp:0:4:0>I'll see you back at the entrance to the
shelter, OK?
talk0049:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm not supposed to play with bad voe.
Come talk to me again if they ever let you
out of there.
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Mama says it's weird, but you agree it's
cute, right?<sp:0:4:0>It's my very own treasure!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Wow! How'd you find it?<sp:0:4:0>I'll lend you the orb now, just like I
promised, so you can play with it as
much as you want.
talk0033:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>What's up? Do you want to see my
treasure up close?
talk0034:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>That's nowhere near where I hid it!<sp:5:0:0>
Unless...you're giving up?
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's the spirit! <sp:5:0:0>Look hard with the time
you have left!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh no, did I make it too hard? <sp:5:0:0>Well, good!
There's a lot at stake here!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>I'll accept a rematch anytime! <sp:5:0:0>Can't wait
for you to challenge me again!
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Sav'orq! You can come and look at it
whenever you want!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting_00>Oh! Hi, voe! <sp:5:0:0>Well? Are you ready to play
with—<sp:5:1:0> I mean, challenge me again?
talk0038: <sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's the spirit!<sp:0:4:0>OK, I'm gonna go get ready!
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Are you ready, voe?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>If you find the <clr:0000>stuffed sand-seal doll<clr:ffff>
before time runs out, you win!<sp:0:4:0>I'm gonna go hide it now, so close your
eyes for a minute!
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Humming>Come on, hurry up! <sp:5:0:0>Think you can find it
in time?
talk0023:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM_00>Aaah! No fair!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0201>You don't get to borrow that until you
challenge me for it first!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:Work_00>Huh? No way! Finders keepers!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101>It takes a special voe, though, to see what
a special orb this is.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>If you like it that much, I guess I could
lend it to you. On one condition.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>You gotta play with— <sp:5:1:0>I mean, challenge
me for it! Beat me and it's yours!<sp:0:4:0>So? Are you ready for a game?
